MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL18 postcode area of Rhyl, affecting properties in Oaklea Court and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 3:37PM. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to on the underground cable fault affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6AM. If this information changes then we will make every effort to contact you. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3AM on 28 October 2020.
